rationale: Music listening/appraising concept — audio playback, guided listening, and structured analysis are ideal for AI delivery.
Music theory/knowledge concept — notation, theory, and music history deliverable with audio tools and visual representations.
notes: Computer can synthesise and play back musical examples; interactive notation exercises are effective.
